item.name: Session Update Status Confirmed in Sale Order
Session Update Status Cancelled in SO

body.raw:
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 16,
    "params": {
        "model": "sale.order",
        "method": "search_read",
        "args": [
            [
                ["partner_id.id", "in", [41, 42]], // the ids for the partners to filter
                ["state", "not in", ["draft", "cancel"]],
                ["invoice_status", "=", "to invoice"],
                ["loan_id", "=", "123"],
                ["customer_ID", "=", "10987"],
                ["vin_sn", "=", "4567890"],
                ["debtor_code", "=", "2132"]
            ]
        ],
        "kwargs": {
            "fields": [ // fileds to return
                "id",
                "name",
                "loan_id",
                "customer_ID",
                "vin_sn", 
                "debtor_code",
                "invoice_status",
                "state"
            ]
        }
    }
}

item.name: Jsonrpc Update Status Confirmed in Sale Order
Jsonrpc Update Status Cancelled in Sale Order

body.raw:
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 16,
    "params": {
        "service": "object",
        "method": "execute_kw",
        "args": [
            "openerp_70104_confisa",
            2,
            "admin",
            "sale.order",
            "search_read",
            [
                [
                    ["partner_id.id", "in", [41, 42]], // the ids for the partners to filter
                    ["state", "not in", ["draft", "cancel"]],
                    ["invoice_status", "=", "to invoice"],
                    ["loan_id", "=", "123"],
                    ["customer_ID", "=", "10987"],
                    ["vin_sn", "=", "4567890"],
                    ["debtor_code", "=", "2132"]
                ]
            ],
            {
                "fields": [ // fileds to return
                    "id",
                    "name",
                    "loan_id",
                    "customer_ID",
                    "vin_sn", 
                    "debtor_code",
                    "invoice_status",
                    "state"
                ],
                "context": {}
            }
        ]
    }
}
